TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class TrackBar Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize
type TrackBar = class inherit Control interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示一个标准的 Windows 跟踪条。

span.span: Represents a standard Windows track bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个可滚动的控件类似于控件。The is a scrollable control similar to the control. 你可以配置通过该范围的值通过设置属性的跟踪条的滚动属性来指定范围的低端和属性来指定范围的上限。You can configure ranges through which the value of the property of a track bar scrolls by setting the property to specify the lower end of the range and the property to specify the upper end of the range. 属性定义中添加或减去的递增单击滚动框的任何一侧上发生时的属性。The property defines the increment to add or subtract from the property when clicks occur on either side of the scroll box. 可以显示跟踪条，水平或垂直。The track bar can be displayed horizontally or vertically. 可以使用此控件以输入数字数据通过获取属性。You can use this control to input numeric data obtained through the property. 可以在控件中显示此数值数据或在代码中使用它。You can display this numeric data in a control or use it in code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，其中包含控件和一个控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性和处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新到属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 带有刻度线标记所示的每个值创建与默认的水平方向和范围的 0 到 10。The is created with a default horizontal orientation and a range of 0 to 10, with a tick mark shown for every value.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整跟踪条的高度或宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.

value.span: 如果自动调整跟踪条的大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性设置为`true`导致跟踪条 （如果水平方向对齐） 调整窗体的高度或宽度 （如果垂直方向对齐）。You can set the property to `true` to cause the track bar to adjust its height (if horizontally aligned) or width (if vertically aligned). 会调整跟踪条显示在其上的屏幕分辨率的标准大小的高度或宽度。The height or width is adjusted to a standard size based on the screen resolution on which the track bar is displayed. 设置属性设置为`false`如果你想要自行调整大小。Set the property to `false` if you want to adjust the size yourself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`TrackBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TrackBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，当滚动框长距离移动时向 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
A numeric value.
The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按下 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 键或单击滚动框中，任意一侧跟踪条根据中设置的值的属性更改属性。When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 可以考虑设置值的百分比形式（对于垂直方向的跟踪条） 或（对于水平方向的跟踪条） 值。You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) value. 这会使跟踪条移动的距离与其大小成比例。This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，其中包含控件和一个控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性和处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新到属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.span: 一个 ，其中包含事件数据。

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用要更新的位置的滚动框更改为其他控件的事件。You can use the event to update other controls as the position of the scroll box changes. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户按箭头键之一时根据中设置的值的属性更改属性。When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 您可以考虑设置的值的值的百分比形式（对于垂直方向的跟踪条） 或（对于水平方向的跟踪条） 属性。You might consider setting the value of to a percentage of the value of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) property. 这会设置跟踪条移动的距离与其大小成比例。This sets the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个包含窗体控件和一个控件。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性和处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新到属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定控件上绘制的刻度之间的增量。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.

value.span: 表示刻度之间的增量的数值。

span.span: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关有之间的值很大变化和属性，它可能不切合实际在控件上绘制的值的所有刻度。For a with a large range of values between the and the properties, it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control. 例如，如果具有 100 个范围的控件，传入的值为 5 此处会导致控件绘制 20 个刻度。For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of 5 here causes the control to draw 20 ticks. 在这种情况下，每个计时周期表示的值的范围中的五个单位。In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个包含窗体控件和一个控件。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 该示例演示了如何设置， ， ，和属性和处理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 内容更新到属性值时事件发生。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于更新其他控件时跟踪栏更改中表示的值。You can use this event to update other controls when the value represented in the track bar changes. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，并成员以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体控件名称`TrackBar1`和一个控件命名为`TextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control name `TrackBar1` and a control named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeTrackBar`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeTrackBar` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method.
